ygData.subject: Cleric Sit-in Consideration
ygData.msgSnippet: I hear a few people out there, who believe that having the Sit-in will lag-out people who are fighting in the Planes...I respect this concern.  This is also
ygData.messageBody:
I hear a few people out there, who believe that having the Sit-in will lag-out people who are fighting in the Planes...I respect this concern. This is also the reason why I encourage people to spread out throughout all three zones of Freeport. It would be hard to get all three zones full enough to begin lagging out, and if they did I would encourage people to move even out to North Ro and ECommons. I have posted these instructions on the web page for this reason only.

On another note, Verant is quite aware of the event at this time, and they plan to do their best in keeping lag down.

Thank you all and I hope this is of some comfort to those concerned.

Sincerely,
Norin Grimsbane
